|Title=Photograph/video of post-paralytic facial hemispasm
|Description=None

Please refer to the CEN website: www.cen-neurologie.fr where videos are available.

question.question: Which of the following is a common symptom associated with post-paralytic facial hemispasm?
question.option_a: Complete paralysis of the facial muscles on one side
question.option_b: Involuntary twitching or spasm of the facial muscles on one side
question.option_c: Loss of sensation in the facial area
question.option_d: Chronic pain in the jaw and ear
